tool_description: Realtime stock& crypto market data for your Stock&Crypto market applications
name: Realtime Stock Market
title: Realtime Stock Market

api_list.name: Financials
api_list.description: Returns financials data of a specific stock or crypto pair
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realtime-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com/v1/TSLA/financials"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtime-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://realtime-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com/v1/{symbol}/financials"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtime-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Recommendations
api_list.description: Returns Yahoo Finance's recommendations for the passed Symbol

api_list.name: Check Symbol Validity
api_list.description: Checks the validity of a passed symbol
api_list.code:

url = "https://realtime-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com/v1/TSLA/symbol-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtime-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

api_list.name: Summary
api_list.description: Returns the summary of a stock or a crypto pair (examples : AAPL, BTC-USD)
